name: Professional Stellar Nanodeck
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Most of these items can only be acquired if you have access to Mitaar Hero, Ground Chief Vortexx and the 12-Man encounters, as well as a few key items from various high-level encounters/quests bits! #L "Unknown Mixture" "281095" #L "A piece of cloth" "281098" #L "Nanodeck Activation Device" "280785" #L "Kenneth's Polishing Gel" "255555" #L "xxx Nanodeck" "270762" #L "Star of xxx" "244691" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Note: for demonstration purposes we'll show how to build MA nanodeck: Unknown Mixture + Kenneth's Polishing Gel = #L "Grostad's Polishing Gel" "281094" Grostad's Polishing Gel + A piece of cloth = #L "Grostad's piece of polishing cloth" "281099" Grostad's piece of polishing cloth + Star of Equanimity = #L "Stellar Equanimity" "281046" Nanodeck Activation Device + Martial-Artist Nanodeck = #L "Activated Martial-Artist Nanodeck" "280764" Stellar Equanimity + Activated Martial-Artist Nanodeck = #L "Stellar Martial-Artist Nanodeck" "280778"
